title: HOW TO BUILD THE ULTIMATE NO DIG GARDEN! (USING COVER CROPS AS A SHEET MULCH)

tasks.task: Applying the no-dig garden method using cover crops and compost
subtasks: Laying down a silage tarp to cover garden plot, ensuring thorough wetting before covering with the tarp
Planting a seed cover crop and allowing time for maturation
Terminating the cover crop at the milk stage and crimping the plants to create a mulch
Re-applying the silage tarp for the creation of a nutrient-rich sheet mulch
Harvesting cover crops for financial benefits through USDA grants (acknowledgment of tool mention, not a physical task)
Marking garden beds统一尺寸 for consistent management with stakes and twine
Adding compost to garden beds and testing compost for potential herbicide contamination
Covering walkways with wood chips to maintain soil moisture and suppress weeds
Prepping the garden bed for future planting (e.g., adding compost, converting winter squash residue to walkway)
